basics.name: Aidan Boop
basics.label: Data Science Student at MTU
basics.summary: An MTU Student based out of Charlevoix, MI. Uses their free time to weight train, participate in Greek Organization Activities, and hang out with friends.

work.name: Great Lakes Fireworks
work.summary: Operated and managed large fireworks displays, specifically 1.3g fireworks. We followed proper safety protocols as well.

volunteer.summary: Made sure that event spectators didn't cross the course during active track hours. Set up the course for the racers as well.
highlights: Met famous rally driver Travis Pastrana.

awards.title: John Philip Sousa Award
awards.summary: The John Philip Sousa Award is dedicated to those with astounding musicianship and leadership. Those who receive it are acknowledged for those qualities.

references.name: Professor Scott Pomerville
references.reference: Referred students to create a portfolio of themselves.

projects.name: The Winner's Circle
projects.summary: Charity gaming tournament hosted by BisectHosting and I. 30 Content Creators play to win 1st place and secure the prize
